award_title: Collaborative Research: Research Infrastructure: Di-ODE: Digital Integration of Odonates
subject: Making computational work actually visible
body:
Hi Robert,

Building platforms that integrate massive specimen collections is computational work that deserves to live beyond a methods section.

Right now, the analysis code and pipelines you develop get cited once, then disappear. Ouro makes that computational work discoverable and reusableâ€”so other researchers can actually build on what you've created, and you can see where your methods end up.

Worth a quick conversation? Happy to walk you through it.

Hope you're having a good holiday.

Best,
Matt

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
